actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Murkowski with amendments. With written report No. 106-206.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 362.
Passed Senate with amendments by Unanimous Consent.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Forests and Public Land Management

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance by the Bureau of Land Management to Douglas County, Oregon, of a county park and certain adjacent land.

summary.text: Miwaleta Park Expansion Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey to Douglas County, Oregon, without consideration, Miwaleta Park and an adjacent tract of Bureau of Land Management land. Requires the County to manage such land for public park purposes in a manner so as not to adversely affect attainment of the objectives of the adjacent Late Successional Reserve and in accordance with a management plan for the area developed in cooperation with the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance by the Bureau of Land Management to Douglas County, Oregon, of a county park and certain adjacent land.
